idea-plugin.name: Jumpy
idea-plugin.description:
A quick cursor navigation plugin for Rider, inspired by VSCode's Jumpy extension.
Press Shift+Enter to activate jumpy mode, then type a two-letter combination to jump to any word in the visible editor.
Features: - Quick navigation to any visible word using two-letter labels - Minimal visual interference - Works with all file types
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.0

  • Initial release
  • Jump to word starts using two-letter combinations
  • Configurable keyboard shortcut (default: Shift+Enter)
